page.title: 18A DAY IN THE LIFE OF.
page.content: In the morning when I wake up I have my breakfast and then I get dressed. Then I wash and brush my teeth and set off for school.We travel to school by car. At 9-00 a.m. a teacher blows a whistle and we all lead into class. We get our hymn books and we go straight to assembly.We spend most of the day working but we have playtime at 10-40 a.m. for 20 minutes and we stop for lunch at 12-00. I bring sandwiches to eat.We finish school at 3-15 p.m. and we go home in the car. When I get home I usually play with the cat and have an ice pop. At 6-30 p.m. my Dad comes home and we all have tea together. After tea I watch the television or have a bath. I go to bed at 8-30 and read for a while before going to sleep. A ten year old girl.
